text: Ha' vahe'mo'za hosi agumpi manine'za taragi'za ne-eazageno, bainati kazi zamireti'ene karugaru keve zamiretira ru marave marave nehanige'za egahaze. Ana nehu'za rama'a vahe eme zamahe frisnageno, frisaza vahe'mokizmi zamavufagamo'a hihi huno amne zankna huno hamprigara osugahie. Ana hanige'za vahe'mo'za zamaga ana zamagofetu re'za vano nehu'za tanafara hugahaze.
